greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array read by antidiagonals upwards: T(n,k) = Sum_{j=1..k} n^(k-j)*Stirling_2(k,j) (n >= 0, k >= 1).
reference: A. Kerber, A matrix of combinatorial numbers related to the symmetric groups, Discrete Mathematics, 21 (1978), 319-321.
link: A. Kerber, A matrix of combinatorial numbers related to the symmetric groups<, Discrete Math., 21 (1978), 319-321. [Annotated scanned copy]
maple: for n from 0 to 8 do lprint(r(n)); od:
xref: Three versions of this array are A111673, A241578, A241579.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 29 2014
